content: keep your dnd dice together with this drawstring dice bag crochet pattern featuring basic stitches simple construction and two sizes you ll be done with your dice bag in under an hour a free version of the pattern are available here https //www youshouldcraft com/dice-bag-crochet-pattern-free **materials ** 35-65 yards of dishie or similar #4 worsted weight yarn 4 0 mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors note the sample photos use dishie cotton yarn in azure and mulberry **share your divine dice bags ** if you crochet the divine dice bag please share it with me on instagram tag me @youshouldcraft or use hashtag #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
